selectedVerses.text: And when he had said these things, he went on ahead, going up to Jerusalem.

"When the people of the land come before the LORD at the appointed feasts, he who enters by the north gate to worship shall go out by the south gate, and he who enters by the south gate shall go out by the north gate: no one shall return by way of the gate by which he entered, but each shall go out straight ahead.
Let my lord pass on ahead of his servant, and I will lead on slowly, at the pace of the livestock that are ahead of me and at the pace of the children, until I come to my lord in Seir."
And he sent messengers ahead of him, who went and entered a village of the Samaritans, to make preparations for him.
So the present passed on ahead of him, and he himself stayed that night in the camp.
